# DmiProperty.Bios.BiosVersion property

Gets a value representing the key to retrieve the property value.

String number of the BIOS Version.

This value is a free-form string that may contain core and OEM version information.

Key Composition

* Structure: Bios
* Property: BiosVersion
* Unit: None

Return Value

Type: String

Remarks

2.0+

```csharp
public static IPropertyKey BiosVersion { get; }
```
